name: Train Trap
description:
The game will be played in a side-scrolling view and take place on a train. The player can talk to NPC, interact with specific objects, and pick up items. Other than that, the players have a unique ability which is reading minds. Using this ability allowed players to read any living thing’s mind by staying with them close enough. This could help the player gather more information and solve puzzles. 

The player has only 3 minutes before his death arrives. Once it reaches 3 minutes, the bomb will explode and kill everyone on the train including the player. After a while of his death, he will restart back in the train as the entrance closed and depart again and again till he evades his fate. The main goal of the player is to prevent his death in order to escape his death loop.
